verses.name: 2 Samuel 18:30
verses.text: And the king said unto him, Turn aside, and stand here. And he turned aside, and stood still.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 18:31
verses.text: And, behold, Cushi came; and Cushi said, Tidings, my lord the king: for the Lord hath avenged thee this day of all them that rose up against thee.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 18:32
verses.text: And the king said unto Cushi, Is the young man Absalom safe? And Cushi answered, The enemies of my lord the king, and all that rise against thee to do thee hurt, be as that young man is.
